origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BankData.get_credit_risk_data', 'description': 'Get credit risk transfer data for a specific bank over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for the data, e.g., 'last_five_years'.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'credit_risk_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing credit risk transfer data for the specified bank and period.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.analyze_credit_risk', 'description': 'Analyze credit risk transfer data using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The credit risk transfer data to be analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis results, including key factors and trends.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.predict_future_trends', 'description': 'Predict future credit risk transfer trends based on historical data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'historical_data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The historical credit risk transfer data to base predictions on.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'predictions', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the predicted future trends.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.provide_management_suggestions', 'description': 'Provide management suggestions based on AI analysis and predictions.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The results of the AI analysis.'}, {'name': 'predictions', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The predictions of future trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'suggestions', 'description': 'A list of management suggestions based on the AI analysis and predictions.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取Wells Fargo过去五年的信用风险转移数据。接下来，使用人工智能算法分析信用风险转移的关键因素。然后，预测未来一年的信用风险转移趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的信用风险转移管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Wells Fargo过去五年的信用风险转移数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
